title: One Piece Episode 355 Recap: Food, Nami, And Shadows!! Luffy's Enraged Counterattack
author: [swim squad]
description: A detailed recap and review of Episode 355, praising the episode's action sequences and the introduction of Oars as a major threat. The reviewer gives it 4/5 Building-crushing Monsters and notes the episode's fun zombie-fighting antics.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Episode 355 and teases upcoming episodes
